name: Tokyo
clues: I am an island nation's capital, where ancient shrines meet neon skyscrapers.
My crossing is famous for being the busiest intersection in the world.
I host the world's tallest tower, which stands at 634 meters.
My name translates to 'Eastern Capital' in my native language.

name: Paris
clues: I am known as the 'City of Light' and have a famous iron lady watching over me.
My river, the Seine, divides me into the Left and Right Banks.
I am home to the world's most visited museum, which houses the Mona Lisa.
My 12 avenues radiate from the Arc de Triomphe like a star.

name: Cairo
clues: I stand near the delta of the longest river in the world.
Ancient wonders guarding my outskirts are the only surviving wonders of the ancient world.
I am known as 'The City of a Thousand Minarets'.
My museum houses the golden mask of a boy king.

name: Rio de Janeiro
clues: I am famous for my giant Art Deco statue of Jesus overlooking the city.
My annual carnival is considered the biggest in the world.
I have iconic beaches named Copacabana and Ipanema.
Sugarloaf Mountain is one of my most famous natural landmarks.

name: New York City
clues: I am the 'City That Never Sleeps' and feature a green lady in my harbor.
My central park is one of the most filmed locations in the world.
I am made up of five boroughs, with Manhattan being the most famous.
Wall Street in my financial district is the center of global finance.
